main event: On October 15, 1961, a UFO sighting was reported in Los Angeles, California, involving three objects that appeared to change brightness and color, hovering and darting erratically.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 35 minutes,The observer used binoculars to view the objects and noted their high altitude and speed,The objects were described as lights of different sizes and intensities,The conclusion drawn was that the objects were likely balloons,The incident is notable as it had no corroborating reports and the witness was a retired member of the U.S. Air Force.
witness description: A 32-year-old female with a light to moderate interest in flying saucers and some past experiences with UFOs.
